name: Universe Surfing
description:
In 2119, humans successfully developed a super-light-speed aircraft that could gain energy by entering the gravitational orbit of different planets, and launched the "Universe Surfing" project to explore the space that was previously unreachable.

Outer space is beautiful and mysterious, and it is full of crises everywhere. The aircraft needs to be responsive, quickly reach another planet before the fuel runs out or crashes on the planet, and sometimes has to be careful to avoid obstacles. Skills and luck are indispensable.

How far can the “Universe Surfing” project go and what can be found in distant outer space? Everything is waiting for you to reveal. Are you ready? Come to a thrilling fantasy space trip!

Game features:
Fantastic space scenes design;
Unique and creative gameplay;
Challenging level design;
Immersive and dynamic music;
Simple and straightforward one finger tap control;
Collection elements of multiple galaxies;
Various spacecraft design;
Trajectory transformation of various colors;
Global ranking and achievement system;
